entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
